review_title: Worth it if you are travelling to multiple attractions
review_body: The bus was quite empty on the weekend I went. It's worth taking the bus if you are travelling to multiple stops. Alternatively you can take the local bus.

I took the City tour bus from Nami island heading to Petite France 25 minutes drive ,there's a lady who sell the bus tickets who can speak English and a bus driver . The ticket was 6000 won per person for a hop on and hop off experience. It goes to garden of morning calm , gapyeong station too .
